name: MiniJava Compiler
body:
### MiniJava Compiler

This is a compiler for a slightly modified version of the MiniJava
language described in Appel's *Modern Compiler Implementation in Java*.
It was created as part of the course *DD2488 Compiler Construction* at
KTH.

For compiler sources and more information, see the
[GitHub repository](http://github.com/estan/mjc).

Generated JavaDoc documentation for the compiler sources is available
[here](http://estan/github.io/mjc/doc).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
